text: 18|58|anal, (napiye!) Umatu iraivan mikka mannippavanum, karunaiyutaiyavanum avan. Avarkal ceyyum (tiya) ceyalin karanamaka avan avarkalai (utanukkutan) pitippataka iruntal ituvarai avarkalai vetanai ceyteyiruppan. Eninum, (avarkalait tantikka) avarkalukku oru tavanai untu. Atarkup pinnar avarkal tappa vali kanamattarkal
